metadata.title: CVE-2024-26308 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability inApache Commons Compress.This issue affects Apache Commons Compress: from1.21 before 1.26.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.26, which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
